name: Mobile Menu Removal for Genesis
author: Vijay Malviya

sections.description:
Very Simple Plugin We Created to Remove Mobile Menu on Genesis Sample Theme.

If any reason you can’t Change Updated Genesis Sample Theme then this Plugin Will Increase Cls Score by Removing Responsive Menu on Mobile.

It Doesn’t Change or Touch any Theme Files, Only Register one Simple Css which display none menu on Mobile Screen. It Helps in Increasing Cls Score on Google Page Insights.

Features of Mobile Menu Removal for Genesis

  • Quick to set up
  • Light Weight
  • No Configurations

Credits

This plugin is created by Vlivetricks , Tech Tricks , WpSeoHosts & Twitter trends now .
sections.installation:
You can search “Mobile Menu Removal for Genesis” on the WordPress Add New Plugin page , or download the archive.

  1. To install this plugin, Login to your WordPress admin account
  2. Go to Plugins Page, and click on “Add New Plugin” button.
  3. Once you’re on the Plugin page, click on the “Upload Plugin” button
  4. Now Select the Plugin and Click on “Install Now”
  5. Your plugin is successfully installed. Now click on “Activate” button to activate the plugin.
sections.faq:
Can I use other than Genesis Sample theme ?

Yes, you can use it with genesis theme if not works then Change css elements in plugin folder css file.
